3.name: Skritt Slayer
3.description: Scrape these scavengers off the surface of Tyria.

300.name: All We See, We Own
300.description: Can these keeps guard any secrets from you?

400.name: Skipping Stones
400.description: Brave the thermal vents and investigate an ancient shipwreck.

460.name: Refugee Volunteer
460.description: Refugees traveling south from Diessa Plateau to the Black Citadel are in need of assistance. Light campfires, fix signposts, battle the Molten Alliance, and aid the refugee migration.

540.name: Rox - The Hatchery
540.description: Rox has orders from Rytlock to secure assets at the devourer hatchery northwest of the town of Nolan in Diessa Plateau. She would appreciate your support.

569.name: Rage Against the War Machine
569.requirement: Destroy the Molten Alliance weapons facility in Diessa Plateau.

696.name: Bazaar Ambassador
696.requirement: Complete  Bazaar of the Four Winds achievement.

717.name: Colossal Kites
717.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in the Cliffside Fractal in the Fractals of the Mists.

782.name: Crown Pavilion Participant
782.requirement: Complete events inside the Crown Pavilion.

955.name: Key Maker
955.requirement: Create an Aether Key using Aether Key Pieces.

972.name: World Ranker
972.requirement: Gain  world rank in the Mists.

1062.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1062.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1068.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1068.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1107.name: Tower of Nightmares Survivor
1107.requirement: Survive  chamber in the Tower of Nightmares.

1142.name: Fractal Fortnight
1142.requirement: Complete fractal daily achievements and other achievements from this category.

1271.name: Winter Wonderland Winner II
1271.description: Make a run for some holiday cheer.
1271.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

1335.name: Wurm Barf
1335.requirement: Get regurgitated by the amber great jungle wurm.

1518.name: Build Your Own Backbone
1518.requirement: Equip or reequip an exotic-quality or higher Spinal Blades back item.

1519.name: Six Minutes to Knightfall
1519.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1519.requirement: Defeat all three assault knights within six minutes after the event starts.

1583.name: Gauntlet Contender
1583.requirement: Defeat  Queen's Gauntlet boss in the Crown Pavilion during the Festival of the Four Winds.

1676.name: Boomyaks
1676.requirement: Keep all explosives-laden dolyaks alive on the trip to Barrowstead's gate in Frostgorge Sound.

1685.name: Birthday—Year 5
1685.description: You have a character that is more than 5 years old.

1704.name: Sneaky Sleuth
1704.requirement: Complete the party investigation without arousing any suspicion.

1844.name: Daily WvW Objective Defender
1844.requirement: Defend a castle, keep, tower, or supply camp for your realm in World versus World.

1877.name: Daily Windy Cave Treasure Minidungeon
1877.requirement: Complete the Windy Cave Treasure minidungeon in Lornar's Pass.

1929.name: Daily Morgan's Leap Jumping Puzzle
1929.requirement: Complete the Morgan's Leap jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.

2022.name: Daily Frozen Maw
2022.requirement: Defeat the Champion Svanir Shaman Chief and break his control over the Ice Elemental in Frusenfell Creek in Wayfarer's Foothills.

2032.name: Snowball Mayhem Participant
2032.description: Your hands must be freezing by now.

2035.name: Golden Generosity
2035.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2070.name: Don't Look Now
2070.requirement: Stand in the correct location to avoid being mesmerized by the Mordrem Vinewrath while fighting the Mordrem Mangler.

2125.name: Gallant Weapon Collection
2125.requirement: Unlock all  Gallant weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2227.name: Agent's Pack
2227.requirement: Collect all  items to create your Agent's Pack.
2227.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Complete the story step "Prized Possessions."
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Complete the story step "Strange Observations."
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Complete the story step "Buried Insight."
Complete the story step "Heart of Thorns."

2377.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 37
2377.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2402.name: Seeker of Lost Homework
2402.description:
"Math? Of course I know math! What kind of things are they teaching you kids these days? Bah!"
—Councillor Phlunt
2402.requirement: Collect  junk items from Fractal Encryptions awarded in the Fractals of the Mists.

2480.name: Bolt III: Zap
2480.description: Brilliance strikes like a bolt from the blue, and that electric shock of imagination applies to both wielding and crafting the mightiest of weapons. Gather the energies of Tyria to infuse them into a superior weapon in your journey to craft the legendary precursor Zap.

bits.text: Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from the cooling chamber in the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a chak energy attack.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a branded projectile from the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from an Inquest Technician using Shocking Stab.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a Veteran Air Elemental by killing it within melee range.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from an aspect lightning crystal in Dry Top.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a spark at Opticalium's lab in Metrica Province.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from the central turret in Vexa's Laboratory in Fireheart Rise.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a rotating wall while fighting Frizz in the Aetherblade Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a lightning strike at Goemm's Lab in Metrica Province.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a lightning field in the Inquest Golem Mark II battle in Mount Maelstrom.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from an Aetherblade Striker's channeled lightning attack.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from the turrets guarding the ramp in the Uncategorized Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a lightning turret in the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from the Jade Maw's beam attack in the Solid Ocean Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from First Mate Horrik's lightning attack in the Mai Trin Fractal.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a turret inside Oola's lab after it closes.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from energy projectiles flying from the central reactor of Spekk's Lab in Caledon Forest.
Use the Luminates Plant in Metrica Province to add illumination to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the wreckage of the Breachmaker in Lion's Arch to add ley-line energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the Thaumacore Energy Source in Brisban Wildlands to add some unpredictable energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the Ancient Energy Source in Sparkfly Fen to add more energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the Strange Energy Source in Timberline Falls to add some strange energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the energy beams at the top of the Second Aetherblade Site in Gendarran Fields to add secrecy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the Metal Forest in Malchor's Leap to add pyrite to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the Heart of the Volcano in Mount Maelstrom to add fire to a piece of charged quartz.
Use the sunbeam in the Forsaken Halls in Dredgehaunt Cliffs to add solar energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2497.name: Chak Killer—Expert
2497.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2504.name: Flawless Escape
2504.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, avoid taking any hit.

2523.name: SCAR Lane Defender
2523.requirement: Successfully participate in the SCAR lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2550.name: Nevermore IV: The Raven Spirit
2550.description: Take upon yourself the responsibility of raising a raven from egg to chick to adult, while you work toward taming the wild raven spirit you have already caught. With the blessings of the Great Spirit, Raven, these two are destined to join together, earning you the Gift of the Raven Spirit, the penultimate step to attaining the legendary staff, Nevermore.

bits.text: Offered for purchase from Shaman Sigrytha after honoring the Spirit of Raven in Wayfarer Foothills.
Raven eggs have been known to fall out of their nests around the Heart of the Raven in Wayfarer Foothills.
Take your Raven Egg to the Ravenbeak Shrine in Lornar's Pass to gain the blessings of Raven.
Take your Raven Egg to the Raven's Wing Shrine in Dredgehaunt Cliffs to consecrate it for melding with the wild raven spirit.
Stand in the Shadow Behemoth's Chaos Rift in Queensdale with your Raven Egg to prepare it for the chaos of the Mists.
Bring your Raven Egg to the entrance of the Artesian Waters in Cursed Shore to bathe it in the water from the source.
Bathe your Raven Egg in the ley-infused waterfalls of the Tranquil Refuge of Deeproot Sink in the Tangled Depths.
Fly to the top of the forgotten pillar near the Broken Altar of Dragon's Stand to bathe your Raven Egg in the falling waters.
Bathe your Raven Egg in the mineral waters of Southsun Cove.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Harvested from the Veteran Spider Queen hiding in the cave behind the houses of Darkwound Defile in Kessex Hills.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

After acquiring Raven's blessing, consecrating and treating your Raven Egg, building the incubation box, gathering the silk insulation, and fashioning the warming stone, take your Raven Egg into the caldera of Mount Maelstrom to give it the last blast of heat needed to hatch it.
Purchase a herring from Fisher Travis in Queensdale after helping him maintain the river, and then feed it to your raven chick.
Feed a clam to your raven chick.
Harvest the meat of a plains wurm and feed it to your raven chick.
Harvest the meat of a luminescent grub and feed it to your raven chick.
Feed a prickly pear to your raven chick.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Show your raven your flying skills while completing the Highest Gear behind the Falls in Auric Basin.
Show your raven your flying skills by jumping off of the Precarious Perch in Verdant Brink and flying due west to the flaming airship wreckage.
Show your raven your flying skills by jumping off of the Arboreal Overlook in Tangled Depths and flying to the mushroom ledge across the way.
Show your raven your flying skills while fighting and beating Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.
Feed a fish steak to your raven chick.
Purchase salmon roe from Fisherman Will in Queensdale after helping the fishermen of Beetletun, and then feed it to your raven chick.
Harvest a protein-rich mushroom cap from the mushrooms of the jungle and feed it to your raven chick.
Feed a passion fruit to your raven chick.
Harvest a termite larvae and feed it to your raven chick.
After feeding, housing, and teaching your raven to fly, speak to Moda the Quick in the Raven Lodge in Hoelbrak.
Take your raven to Dredgehaunt Cliffs and traverse the Tribulation Caverns to prime your raven for melding with a tamed spirit.

Take your Primed Raven and a Vision Crystal to the Raven Shaman's Power Source hidden within Darkhoof Heights in Snowden Drifts and use it to meld your Raven with the tamed spirit you have cultivated.
Slay the evil Raven Shaman, Vilnia Shadowsong, to gain access to the Raven Shaman's Power Source hidden within Darkhoof Heights in Snowden Drifts.
Upon completing the spirit's tests of power, friendship, and putting mists items to rest, visit the Heart of the Raven to ponder Raven as you prepare to meld this tamed spirit with a primed raven.
Collect a Red Iris Flower from the Urban Battleground Fractal and bring it to rest at the Viewing Hill plaque in Plains of Ashford.
Bring the Ancient Svanir Relic to rest at the foot of Jora's statue in Wayfarer Foothills.
Found in the chest in the Snowblind Fractal.
Bring the Ancient Grawl Relic to rest in the sacred waters of the God's Hand in Fireheart Rise.
Found in the chest in the Volcanic Fractal.
Take the Ancient Dwarven Texts from the mists to Ogden so that he may put them to rest.
Found in the Underground Facility Fractal chest.
Take the Ancient Cultists Texts to Sage Salim in Tarir, the Forgotten City of Auric Basin, so that he might put it to rest.
Found in the Cliffside Fractal chest.
Lay the phantom residue to rest at the foot of the Statue of Grenth in Lornar's Pass.
Found in the treasure chest after defeating the Shadow Behemoth in Queensdale.
Purchase from Blopp at Loch Jezt in Metrica Province after helping him stop the Inquest from using hylek poison to drive lake creatures crazy.
Use repellent to protect the sylvan hounds from spiders in the Verdence of Caledon Forest.
Purchase from Danador after helping to manage his kennel in the Verdence of Caledon Forest.
Shoo the rabbits of Shaemoor back into their pen.
Purchase from Cassie after helping her around Mepi's Moa Ranch in Queensdale.
Answer riddles posed by Raven's statues around the Heart of the Raven in Wayfarer Foothills.
Protect the owl spirits from Jormag's minions at Owl's Abattoir in Snowden Drifts.
Defeat the Svanir hunters before they kill all the owls around Owl's Abattoir in Snowden Drifts.
Stop the grawl from stealing drake eggs in the Outcast's Cleft of Wayfarer Foothills.
Defend the Bear Shrine from the Sons of Svanir at the Heart of the Bear in Wayfarer Foothills.
Help Moa Trainer Kappa herd the pygmy moas into the pen in the Queen's Forest of Queensdale.
Show your power over spirits by killing Siegemaster Lormar in the ruins of Ascalon City in the Plains of Ashford.
Show your power over spirits by defeating the Ascalonian soldiers of Duke Barradin's army in the Battle in the Vault under the Old Duke's Estate in Plains of Ashford.
Show your power over spirits by drawing out and destroying the Demagogue's spirit at Aurora's Remains in Brisban Wildlands.
Show your power by embodying energy and achieving a rank of silver or better in The Ley-Line Run adventure of Tangled Depths.
Begin taming the captured wild spirit by visiting the shrine to Raven in the Raven Lodge of Hoelbrak to bow and pay your respects.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Scholar of Secrets ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2639.name: My Friends, the Smiths
2639.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2639.requirement: While traveling to the Mordrem prison camp, find and rescue the five ordnance masters from the Pact: Baroosh, Shashoo, Beigarth, Izu, and Occam.

2678.name: Wings of Glory—Champion
2678.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2678.requirement: Purchase 1 Champion's Wings of Glory from the League Vendor.

2696.name: Daily League Participator—Veteran
2696.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.
2696.requirement: Increments each day after playing in 3 ranked matches.

2751.name: League Mesmer—Elite
2751.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2751.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a mesmer.

2793.name: The Bells of Wintersday
2793.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2799.name: Crystal Healing Denier
2799.description: Healing crystals? Sounds like a scam...
2799.requirement: Destroy  pulsating crystal node during the Shatterer battle.

2817.name: Daily Top Stats
2817.description: There's more than one way to contribute. You find the one that works.
2817.requirement: Earn a top scoreboard stat on your team in a PvP match.

2840.name: Environmental Science 201
2840.requirement: Smash the tree stump in World 2, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2864.name: Adventuring 102
2864.requirement: Complete World 1, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2959.name: Daily Twilight Arbor
2959.requirement: Complete any path in the Twilight Arbor explorable dungeon.

2971.name: Daily Tier 2 Solid Ocean
2971.requirement: Complete Solid Ocean at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2983.name: Daily Heart of Maguuma Vista Viewer
2983.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
2983.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Heart of Maguuma maps: Verdant Brink, Auric Basin, Tangled Depths, and Dragon's Stand.

2990.name: Chuka and Champawat I: The Hunt
2990.description: Great game is what makes a great hunt, and few beasts are greater than the ferocious tiger. Sightings of such a creature have been made around Tyria. With a veteran hunter's tutelage, this glorious hunt could be yours.
2990.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Speak with Bagred the Hunter in Snowden Drifts to learn to craft a book that Bagred can use to create a hunter's journal.
Complete the Hunter's Journal subcollection.
Speak with Bagred the Hunter near Hrothgar's Pass in Snowden Drifts to learn this huntsman's recipe.
Drops rarely from tigers.
Slay the Giant Boar in Queen's Forest in Queensdale.
Purchased from Seraph Watchman Morina in Brisban Wildlands.
Defeat the largos attacking the Song of Final Exile in Snowden Drifts.

2992.name: Hold the Line
2992.requirement: Don't allow any accumulated ley-line magic to be absorbed by dragon minions.

3074.name: A Shadow's Deeds
3074.requirement: Journey to the Cavern of Unseen Lights and seek any clues as to the source of the explosion.

3090.name: Bloodstone Harvest
3090.requirement: Recover the bloodstone slivers that have affected creatures, and collect the remaining slivers in the world before they can do more harm.

bits.text: Sightings reported in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Kessex Hills, and Brisban Wildlands.
Sightings reported in Dry Top, Silverwastes, Blazeridge Steppes, and Fields of Ruin.
Sightings reported in Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, and Gendarran Fields.
Sightings reported in Frostgorge Sound, Bloodtide Coast, and Mount Maelstrom.
Sightings reported in Verdant Brink and Tangled Depths.
The Silverwastes: This one landed right on the SS Topsy-Turvy. Recover it before the skritt find it!
Frostgorge Sound: Found on Deep and Troubled Waters where the Voice resides.
Blazeridge Steppes: This piece traveled with the current in Craze's Folly.
Brisban Wildlands: Found in Hidden Lake. There is a bad precedent set when it comes to spirits and bloodstones.
Verdant Brink: This is nested somewhere in the Wyvern Cliffs.
Queensdale: Don't let this disturb those who rest.
Harathi Hinterlands: This one overlooks the battle from the Overwatch Camp.
Rata Sum: Err on the side of caution for this one.
Timberline Falls: If the krait had legs, they probably would've found this one by now.
Mount Maelstrom: Southwest of the Maelstrom's Core lies a crack in the volcano.

3103.name: Ember Bay Insight: Caliph's Steps
3103.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Ember Bay.

3123.name: "Rising Flames" Mastery
3123.description: If the volcano doesn't get you...

3124.name: Broodmother Down by the Bay
3124.requirement: Slay the drake broodmother southwest of Shipwreck Beach.

3331.name: Silent Killer
3331.description: The blood of your enemies stains the snow.
3331.requirement: Earn glory in the Temple of the Silent Storm by completing these achievements.

3348.name: "The Head of the Snake" Mastery
3348.requirement: Complete all  "The Head of the Snake" achievements.

3446.name: In Pursuit of a God
3446.description: Journal: In Pursuit of a God Completed
3446.requirement: Follow your foe's tracks deeper into the volcano.

3447.name: Sprouting the Druid Stone
3447.description: Continue to cultivate your relationship with nature through tributes to the druid spirits of Draconis Mons.

bits.text: Dropped by the Stonehead King in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Saurian Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Emperor Mattake in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Imperial Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the webby mother in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Webby Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Bloodstone-charged lava wurm in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Wurm Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Inquest Power Suit in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Arcanum Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Bring 5 Fire Orchids and a Charged Lodestone to Kodama in the Savage Rise.
Bring 5 Fire Orchids and a Glacial Lodestone to Liriodendron in the watering hole of the Savage Rise.
Bring 5 Fire Orchids and an Onyx Lodestone to Broadleaf on a ledge above the Savage Rise.
Bring 5 Fire Orchids and a Molten Lodestone to Rosewood on a ledge above the Ancient Hollow.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil near Kodama in the Savage Rise of Draconis Mons.

3506.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Cliff's Edge
3506.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3521.name: Echolocation
3521.requirement: Fly through the wyvern's ring attack without getting hit.

3551.name: Lost Pilgrims
3551.requirement: Speak to the ritual priests Hehmnut, Kahdat, and Nahtem at their gravesites. The priests will only appear in response to a Vision Crystal.

bits.text: Ritual Priest Hehmnut
Ritual Priest Kahdat
Ritual Priest Nahtem

3564.name: Hidden and Dishonored
3564.requirement: Discover clues about the Herald of Balthazar's past.

3571.name: Doppel Dropper
3571.requirement: Defeat the crazed doppelganger at the end of the Augury Rock meta event.

3615.name: Crystal Oasis Griffon Expert: Silver
3615.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3629.name: Forgotten Debris
3629.requirement: Discover Forgotten debris spread throughout the Elon Riverlands.

bits.text: Beneath Champion's Gap
Ustulate Barrens
Skyward Reach
Arid Gladefields Pool
Within Augury Rock
Skyward Reach
Deep Below Arid Gladefields
Vulture Drifts
High Above the Elon Riverbank
Shallows of Despair
Beneath Champion's Gap
Godslost Sandfalls
Shoals of Sovereignty
Whispering Grottos
Overlooking the Scavangelands
Overlooking Arid Gladefields
Overlooking Deadlock Sweep
Overlooking Vulture Drifts
Overlooking Shallows of Despair
Deadlock Sweep
Shallows of Despair
Beneath Skyward Reach
Near Sandbound Towers
Elon Flow
Skimshallow Cove
Within Augury Rock

3649.name: Skimshallow Cove Supply Run: Gold
3649.requirement: Gather supplies for the ranch hands of Skimmer Ranch quickly!

3664.name: The Way Forward
3664.requirement: Find answers out in the desert.

3695.name: Desolation Insight: Arena of Vayu
3695.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3708.name: Shadows Intel: Silver
3708.requirement: Gather documents for Order of Shadows agents before time runs out!

3719.name: Adept Mirage
3719.requirement: Begin training the mesmer's mirage elite specialization.

3735.name: Breaking the Bank: Vault 2
3735.description: What have you got to lose?
3735.requirement: Guess the correct chest in the second mysterious bank vault.

3769.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Highjump Rise
3769.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3906.name: Master of Trades
3906.requirement: Find and unlock trade caches in the Crystal Desert region.

3916.name: Masters of the Labyrinth
3916.requirement: Defeat the three oldest champions in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

bits.text: Skeletal Lich
Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn
Labyrinthine Horror

3944.name: Knock Down the Doors
3944.requirement: Complete  door event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3976.name: Amnoon Evacuation
3976.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3976.requirement: Save 40 civilians. Count represents number remaining.

4093.name: "A Bug in the System" Mastery
4093.requirement: Complete all  "A Bug in the System" achievements.

4101.name: Stimulus and Response
4101.description: Engage the brilliant test developed by the Inquest to study hive-mind abilities.
4101.requirement: Solve the comms lab's hive-mind experiment in only 3 steps.

4143.name: Rescue Ranger
4143.requirement: Rescue all skritt for Subject S on your way to the beach.

4291.name: Gauntlet Gladiator
4291.requirement: Defeat a boss in the Queen's Gauntlet arena in the Crown Pavilion.

4316.name: Pavilion Pursuer
4316.requirement: Finish the Pavilion Pursuit race in the Crown Pavilion within 2 minutes (race event or adventure).

4438.name: (Annual) Courtly Service
4438.requirement: Tithe  gold commissioning services for the Mad King's Labyrinth.

4498.name: Bunker Buster
4498.requirement: Destroy 10 Branded creatures by using the Resonating Blast skill inside the auditorium.

4548.name: Chasing Tales: Bladed Justice
4548.description: Carver took out a lifetime of fury upon his enemies.
4548.requirement: Defeat 60 Branded enemies while wielding a sword in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Carver the Carver.
Defeated 60 Branded enemies while wielding a sword in Thunderhead Peaks.

4619.name: Chasing Tales: Asaliea the Channeler
4619.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood focus and perform tasks to re-create Asaliea's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the Dragonsblood focus.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Asaliea at a heroic font.

4630.name: Console Crasher
4630.requirement: Let your warclaw sit on the main console near the archives in Rata Sum.

4660.name: Branded Weapon Collection
4660.requirement: Unlock all  Branded weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4678.name: Skyscale of Ice
4678.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with ice.

bits.text: Speak with Frigid Paw at Talabaroop Waves in Frostgorge Sound.
Expose your skyscale egg to the icy chamber in Derelict Delve in Desert Highlands.
Expose your skyscale egg to the water of the ice flow in Thunderhead Peaks.
Become encased in an ice prison caused by ice storms in Bitterfrost Frontier or during the Claw of Jormag world boss event.

4691.name: Skyscale Rider: Ruins of Orr
4691.description: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore
4691.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in Ruins of Orr.

4709.name: Skyscale Saddle
4709.requirement: Gather components for Gorrik to make a saddle so that you can ride your skyscale.

bits.text: Purchase from Priory Historian Elisa somewhere in the Crystal Desert.
Purchase from Alaleh at Chalon Docks in the Domain of Istan.
Purchase from Ethall at Atholma in Sandswept Isles.
Purchase from Nalar at the Allied Encampment in the Domain of Kourna.
Purchase from Trader Hyacinth at Yatendi Village in Jahai Bluffs.
Purchase from Kynon at the Forge in Thunderhead Peaks.
Purchase from the Traveling Elonian Trader at Pact Command in Dragonfall.

4718.name: Skyscale Rider: Kryta
4718.description: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Harathi Hinterlands, Gendarran Fields, Bloodtide Coast, and Southsun Cove
4718.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in Kryta.

4740.name: Putting Out Fires
4740.requirement:
Complete 10 events for the Order of the Crystal Bloom in the Burning Forest.
Required to gain access to the Crystal Bloom quartermaster.

4764.name: Visions of Thunderhead Peaks
4764.description:
Vision and visions, ended together in time...

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
4764.requirement: Explore Thunderhead Peaks for greater insight.
4764.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

4847.name: Mount Master
4847.requirement: Complete the mount race event or adventure in Hoelbrak.

4882.name: (Annual) Commodities Trader
4882.requirement: Purchase and open Zephyrite Supply Boxes from vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4940.name: "Bound by Blood" Mastery
4940.requirement: Complete  of the following "Bound by Blood" achievement.

5001.name: Extra Life Donor Goal
5001.requirement: As an Extra Life donor, return to Lion's Arch after the community reaches this year's goal.

5028.name: Sweet Surrender
5028.description: You have accepted Jormag's strength and transformed into one of Jormag's minions. The flesh of mortals is yours to devour.

5093.name: Lumbering Bears
5093.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 kodan forestry events.

5131.name: Mystery of Drakkar's Lair
5131.requirement: Complete Mystery of Drakkar's Lair  times.

5142.name: Strong, Like Ox
5142.requirement: While performing rites at the Ox Shrine or while fighting Drakkar, prove your bravery to Ox and absorb damage from falling ice orbs.

5148.name: Truly Nimble Onslaught
5148.requirement: Defeat Drakkar without dying or being hit more than 20 times by its abilities.

5167.name: Wayfarer Foothills Novice Explorer
5167.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Wayfarer Foothills.

bits.text: Honor the Spirit of Raven.
Honor the Spirit of Bear.
Disrupt grawl worship.
Honor the Spirit of Wolf.
Honor the Spirit of Snow Leopard.
Osenfold Waypoint
Hero's Moot Waypoint
Outcast's Waypoint
Grawlenfjord Waypoint
Snowlord's Gate Vista
Doldenvan Passage Vista
Molensk Vista
Point of Interest: Heart of the Raven
Point of Interest: Heart of the Bear
Point of Interest: Hostra's Refuge
Point of Interest: Drakkerjorg Pit
Point of Interest: Heart of the Wolf
Point of Interest: Hirbadd's Camp
Point of Interest: Alpenzure Cave
Point of Interest: Heart of the Snow Leopard

5224.name: Searching for Inspiration
5224.requirement:
Find a collection of Snargle Goldclaw's books across Tyria to remind him of his literary genius and free him from his writer's block.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Living World episodes to complete.</c>

5261.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Overlook
5261.requirement: Spend  War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Petraj Overlook in Drizzlewood Coast.

5279.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Drop Hunter
5279.requirement: Open  Lost Charr Supply Drops in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5351.name: Master of the Storms
5351.requirement: Unlock all  Charged Stormcaller Weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5372.name: The End of the Road
5372.description:
The end is in sight.
The feeling, everlasting.
<c=@flavor>"Stand against me, and you stand alone."—Jormag</c>
What would Aurene think?

5388.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Minesweeper
5388.requirement: Complete an event to defuse Dominion mines in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5415.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Camp Cliffs
5415.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5442.name: Respect for the Dead
5442.requirement: Show respect for those who walked before.

5458.name: Abyssal Fractal Master
5458.description: <c=@flavor>WARNING: Prolonged exposure to the Fractals of the Mists has been known to cause severe side effects in the city-state of Lion's Arch.</c>
5458.requirement: Unlock all  Abyssal Fractal weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5516.name: Bullet Dodger
5516.requirement: Evade a killing blow from Vishen Steelshot using a convincing emotion.

5546.name: Frozen Tide
5546.requirement: Complete the story chapter Frozen Tide.

5555.name: Top Dragon Responder: Lake Doric
5555.requirement: Complete  Lake Doric Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5766.name: Unbound Guardian's Revenge
5766.requirement: Defeat the Unbound Guardian deep within the Cavern of Unseen Lights.

5789.name: Ore Miner: Siren's Landing
5789.requirement: Mine ore  times in Siren's Landing.

5841.name: Return to Pact Assaulted
5841.requirement: Complete the mission Pact Assaulted in Living World Season 2 Episode 8.

5896.name: Bounty Hunter: Sandswept Isles
5896.requirement: Complete bounties within the Sandswept Isles.

6024.name: Return to Bjora Marches 2
6024.requirement: Complete  Return to Shadow in the Ice achievements.

6047.name: Court Duty: The King's Guest
6047.requirement: Visit the Mad King's Labyrinth for some...festive fun. Then follow up on developments observed in the Mad Realm.

bits.text: 1. In the Mad King's Labyrinth, overhear an exchange between Mad King Thorn and a visitor.
3. Demand answers from Brigadier General Kernel in Lion's Arch.
4. Press Brigadier General Kernel for details on the Lunatic Court's quest.
2. Report to Magister Tassi in Lion's Arch on the latest crisis in the Mad Realm.

6057.name: (Weekly) Wintersday Festivities
6057.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
6057.requirement: Participate in the Bell Choir, Toypocalypse, Infinirarium, Winter Wonderland, and the Secret Lair of the Snowmen. Progress awarded varies based on the activity.

6089.name: Ribbit!
6089.requirement: Scan the second set of jade power cells without touching the water, with or without the scanner stowed. No gliding!

6103.name: Shots Fired
6103.requirement: Defeat 10 Jade Brotherhood sniper mechs using the provided rifles.

6115.name: Legendary Harvest Temple
6115.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

6143.name: Adept Vindicator
6143.requirement: Begin training the revenant's vindicator elite specialization.

6156.name: In the Name of the Law
6156.description: Journal: In the Name of the Law Completed

6184.name: Cancel the Apocalypse
6184.requirement: Complete your final stand in the allotted time.

6238.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Ancient Archives
6238.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6245.name: Tracking Number
6245.description: Knew where the packages were at all times.
6245.requirement: Don't get hit by any shipping crates thrown by the haywire loading mech.

6258.name: Echovald Wilds Fisher
6258.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6258.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Echovald Wilds.

bits.text:
Found in the waters of the Echovald Wilds.
Fishing Hole: None, Open Water
Favored Bait: Any
Time of Day: Nighttime

6321.name: Weekly Seitung Province Jade Treasure Recovery
6321.description: Bring recovered treasures to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault.
6321.requirement: Help the Seitung Province Neighborhood Watch Committee fend off Aetherblade attacks during the meta-event.

6362.name: Until We Meet Again
6362.requirement: Check in with all your friends and allies in Arborstone.

6437.name: Rapid Ascent
6437.requirement: Reach the top of the tower in the allotted time.

6481.name: Echovald Wilds Explorer
6481.description: You've explored the hallowed cathedrals and twisted roots of the Echovald Wilds.
6481.requirement: Explore all areas in the Echovald Wilds.

bits.text: Qinkaishi Basin
Xunlai Jade Junkyard
Ferndale
Zu Heltzer Historical Site
Saint's Vale
Brotherhood Woodlands
Melandru's Hope
Quarry Forelands
Warden's Folly
Lake Lutgardis
Mori Village
Aspenwood Gulch

6488.name: Antique Canthan Armor Collector
6488.requirement: Unlock  Antique Canthan Armor Skins by purchasing them from the Keeper of the Jade Vault in the Royal Court.

6530.name: Triangulation
6530.requirement: Each time bombs are placed on the battlefield during the encounter, destroy a ferrous bomb before placing either of the magnetic bombs. Then successfully defeat the Echo.

6546.name: Out of Focus
6546.requirement: Break the sniper out of their Focused Shot during the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission.

6604.name: Leveling Up III
6604.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 50.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6808.name: Escape from Lion's Arch
6808.requirement: Complete the story chapter Escape from Lion's Arch.

6820.name: Sharing the Wintersday Cheer
6820.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Toypocalypse, bring Wintersday joy to the Secret Lair of the Snowmen, or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6822.name: Tyria's New Year
6822.requirement: Open the Chest of the New Year in the Celestial Challenge or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6935.name: Daily Tier 4 Silent Surf
6935.requirement: Complete Silent Surf at fractal scale 76 or higher.

6965.name: Secrets Obscured
6965.description: Isgarren doesn't call on aid lightly. Perhaps you're getting through to him...?
6965.requirement: Retrieve the scattered wizard relics around Tyria.

6973.name: Flashing into Focus
6973.description: Nobody knows who put them there, but everyone agreed it was better to leave them alone.
6973.requirement: Activate all the hidden symbols in the Wizard's Tower within the time limit.

7006.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: War God's Spire
7006.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7018.name: A New Look
7018.requirement: Help Skyscale Trainer Dyanne investigate what's happening to your skyscale mount.
7018.locked_text: Unlocks one hour after completing A New Friend.

bits.text: Talk to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne at the Beacon of Ages.
Purchase the analytical charm from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.
Complete the Skyscale Target Practice adventure.
Defeat 20 Kryptis turrets with your skyscale's Fireball.
Spend 30 continuous seconds being carried by a ley line while mounted on your skyscale.
Bring the collected data back to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne at the Beacon of Ages.
Purchase an anodized medicinal cauldron from Lyhr.
Collect a sample of possession from the Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission, or purchase a sample from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.
Collect a sample of corruption from the Temple of Febe Strike Mission, or purchase a sample from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.
Complete Skyscale Medicine Masker.
Bring the collected medical supplies back to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne at the Beacon of Ages.
Administer the medicine to the skyscale and consult Dyanne.
Complete Arcane Osmogrifier.
Use the arcane osmogrifier with the Heart of the Obscure on the sick skyscale near Skyscale Trainer Dyanne.

7079.name: Protector of the Skyward Marches
7079.description: A kind gesture on the darkest of their days.
7079.requirement: Successfully complete events around the Skyward Marches.

bits.text: Use your skyscale to consume unstable magic.
Help the Astral Ward calm agitated skyscales at Skyward Marches. (Event 1 of 2)
Help the Astral Ward Drive Back the Forged. (Event 1 of 3)
Convince Zaishen deserters not to return to the Forged stronghold. (Event 2 of 3)
Kill the Champion Avatar of Regret. (Event 3 of 3)
Defeat the champion Forged cannonade.
Transport the skyscales to western Skyward Marches. (Event 2 of 2)

7094.name: Skywatch Archipelago Rift Hunting
7094.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Skywatch Archipelago.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7110.name: Eagle Eye Weapon Collector
7110.requirement: Unlock all  Eagle Eye weapon skins by completing events and looting chests in Skywatch Archipelago or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you.

7111.name: Spire of the Forgotten
7111.requirement: Learn more about the Bastion of the Natural and the Forgotten to acquire a powerful and ancient weapon.

bits.text: Assist in Closing a Tentacle Rift in the Bastion of the Natural
Complete the Aid the Bastion of the Natural Achievement
Purchase an Essence of the Natural from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of the Natural
Complete the Forgotten Lore Achievement

7149.name: Legendary Weapon: Kamohoali'i Kotaki
7149.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon Kamohoali'i Kotaki.

7199.name: Zojja's Journal: Rata Novus Promenade
7199.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Rata Novus Promenade fractal.
7199.locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Help the people of Rata Novus.
Page Location: Rata Novus Promenade, overlooking an insectoid colony.
Page Location: Rata Novus Promenade, in a room surrounded by four pillars of crystal.
Page Location: Rata Novus Promenade, on an alcove overlooking lightning's wrath.

7211.name: Into the Obscure
7211.requirement: Explore Amnytas and continue helping the Rift Hunters secure the bastions.

7452.name: Astral Gofer
7452.requirement: Complete the optional tasks for your allies.

bits.text: Find astral navigational charts for Zojja.
Help R'tchikk locate dangerous artifacts around the tower.
Help Frode clear the last of the Kryptis from the Wizard's Tower.

7690.name: Emotional Baggage
7690.requirement:
Collect  Kryptis essences in Convergences. 
(Gain less progress when collecting essence as a wisp with the Wisp Pockets Mastery.)

7693.name: Hero's Origin: Queensdale
7693.requirement:
Complete events in Queensdale in Kryta.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

7854.name: Revenge of the Octovine
7854.requirement: During the siege of Tarir in Auric Basin, defeat the octovine.

7881.name: Foes Reborn: Mordrem
7881.requirement: Defeat Mordrem enemies in any region.

7969.name: (Repeatable) Event Collection: Citadel of Zakiros
7969.description: Is there no end to consumerism?
7969.requirement: Complete each of the  unique events in the Citadel of Zakiros.

bits.text: The Midnight Abyss: Clear the malignant fog protecting Zakiros.
The Midnight Abyss: Disable Zakiros's extractor towers.
The Midnight Abyss: Defeat Gatekeeper Vialgos.
Spire of Redemption: Descend the Spire of Redemption.
Spire of Redemption: Siege the Chamber of Rehabilitation and free the prisoners.
Spire of Redemption: Continue Descending the Spire of Redemption.
Spire of Redemption: Defeat Karax the Harvester.
Spire of Creation: Descend the Spire of Creation.
Spire of Creation: Siege the hatchery and destroy the abyssal watchers.
Spire of Creation: Continue descending the Spire of Creation.
Spire of Creation: Defeat Charybda the Cunning.
Spire of Dreams: Defeat Eparch.

8011.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas: Silver
8011.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas adventure.

8023.name: Event Collection: The Midnight Abyss
8023.description: "Over here—use that skyscale of yours and let's get going!"
8023.requirement: Participate in successful events in the Midnight Abyss.

bits.text: Clear the malignant fog protecting Zakiros.
Disable Zakiros's extractor towers.
Defeat Gatekeeper Vialgos.

8034.name: Nayos Recon Run: Gold
8034.requirement:
Earn a gold medal in the Nayos Recon Run adventure. 

(This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure. Progress will update when you claim the rewards.)

8076.name: Eparch's Early End
8076.requirement: Defeat Eparch within the time limit.

8261.name: Where Do We Go from Here?
8261.requirement: Check in with all of your allies in the aftermath of the battle.

bits.text: Poised Arrow
Stoic Alder
Malice
Caithe

8265.name: Daily Buzzy Treetops
8265.description: Beehives atop trees produce wonderful honey!
8265.requirement: Collect honey samples and complete the Treetop Beehive jumping puzzle.

bits.text: Get a honey jar from Blossoming Spring to start the jumping puzzle.
Buzzie's Beehive
Mrs. Buzz's Beehive
Bob's Beehive
Ebuzzabeth's Beehive
Buzzem's Beehive
Buzzlinda's Beehive
McBuzzer's Beehive

8413.name: Local Response: Sandswept Isles (Weekly)
8413.requirement: Complete  events in the Sandswept Isles.

8465.name: Infinite Arrow Cart
8465.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Arrow Cart.

bits.text: Purchase an arrow cart token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase an arrow cart mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase arrow cart parts from the wyvern admirer in the Desert Borderlands.
Salvage parts from the broken down arrow cart at the top of a garrison.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.

8469.name: Raid Mentor: Decima
8469.description: A good wayfinder is a practiced guide, mentor, and friend.
8469.requirement: Help  players defeat Decima for the first time.

8530.name: Revenge of Metal Legion (Weekly)
8530.requirement: Complete the Metal Legion Concert meta-event in Grothmar Valley.

8640.name: Search-and-Rescue Challenge: Silver
8640.requirement: Earn a silver medal while finding lost kodan scouts in the Search-and-Rescue challenge.

8649.name: Business Management
8649.requirement: Purchase upgrades for your café from the café console.

bits.text: Upgrade: Food (Premium Cans)
Upgrade: Food (Hydra-Lasered)
Upgrade: Drinks (Filtered)
Upgrade: Drinks (Fountain System)
Upgrade: Souvenir (Attractive Feathers)
Upgrade: Souvenir (Attached Bell)
Upgrade: Advertising (Lion's Arch Posters)
Upgrade: Advertising (Black Lion Marketing Service)
Upgrade: Advertising (Gourdon Collaboration)
Upgrade: Zoomies
Upgrade: Complimentary Treats
Upgrade: "Tips Welcome" Sign
Upgrade: Tips (Automatic Suggestion)
Upgrade: Tips (30% Minimum)
Upgrade: Waiter (Jade Bot Alpha)
Upgrade: Waiter (Jade Bot Gamma)
Upgrade: Waiter (Jade Bot Zeta)
Upgrade: Business Hours (Long)
Upgrade: Business Hours (Nocturnal)
Upgrade: Investment in Employees

8657.name: (Daily) Cozy Café
8657.requirement: Open a café in your homestead and serve at least one customer (or help a friend in their homestead).

8669.name: League Conqueror—Conquest
8669.requirement: Win  ranked matches during a Conquest season.

8702.name: Rolling Competitor: Infernal Leap (Weekly)
8702.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Mount Maelstrom. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8743.name: Unknown Nightmares: Gift of the Mistburned Isles
8743.requirement: This collection can be a useful reference for what is needed for each gift to create Orrax Manifested.

bits.text: Found in chests in Janthir Wilds, or purchased from the Trading Post.
Requires the Scholar of Secrets Mastery to purchase from a Mystic Forge vendor.
Crafted using Mursaat Obsidian Chunks, Titan Heatstones, Globs of Ectoplasm, and Ancient Wood Planks.
Purchased from Ward Trader Sampaguita in Bava Nisos.
Earned in Lowland Shore by completing all map locations. Additional copies can be purchased from renown heart vendors in Lowland Shore.
Earned in Janthir Syntri by completing all map locations. Further copies can be purchased from renown heart vendors in Janthir Syntri.
Earned in Mistburned Barrens by completing all map locations. Further copies can be purchased from the renown heart vendor in Mistburned Barrens.
Earned in Bava Nisos by completing all map locations. Further copies can be purchased from Ward Trader Sampaguita in Bava Nisos.

8757.name: Diplomatic Relations
8757.requirement: Check in with all your allies after the heated confrontation in Bava Nisos.

8787.name: (Annual) Skiff Sailor
8787.requirement: Complete the Labyrinthine Skiffs race course  times in Labyrinthine Cliffs (race event or adventure). Finishing in the race event grants extra progress. This achievement can be completed once every year.
